I’ve added the citation. Check the Talk page for proof. The Book of Tang cannot be ignored. Stop with the lies.
Everyone check the Talk page. Quote has been given from the Book of Tang, proving the Byzantines paid tribute to the Arabs after the siege.
/* Quote evidence from the Book of Tang */ new section
/* Tribute was also given from the Byzantines to Mu’awiyah */ new section

From my research it is clear both sides paid some sort of tribute. The Book of Tang (I have given the source) also says the Byzantines paid tribute and gave gold and silk to the Arabs. So I’ve left it as a truce, to be neutral. It wouldn’t make sense to leave it as only one side paying to the other. The Book of Tang cannot be ignored here.
Book of Tang says Byzantines paid tribute. Check Talk page and look it up.
Check the Talk page. Book of Tang says Byzantines paid tribute, not the other way round.
Stop removing sources. I’ve already explained everything on the talk page.
